N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.50 - Attendants

State Regulations

The driver, operator or attendant of any tank vehicle
shall be in attendance with the vehicle at a time when the vehicle is fueling
or refueling an aircraft. Such person shall not leave the tank vehicle to
handle hose for overwing refueling or fuel from a work stand in excess of six
feet in height or in a position more than 50 feet from the tank vehicle unless
a firewatch, familiar with the operation, is on hand on the ground. A firewatch
shall not serve more than two vehicles or two aircraft under fuel servicing
simultaneously and must be within 75 feet of any operation under his
surveillance. Notes
